full_summary:
### Development of Technical Guidance for Surface Temperature and Air Temperature Mapping in Canada

**Notice Title:** 
**Élaboration d'orientations techniques pour faire évoluer les cartes de la température en surface et de la température de l'air au Canada**

**Notice Reference:** cb-606-31480163
**Notice Amendment:** 8
**Notice Number:** 2023-24
**Notice Date Published:** January 5, 2024
**Notice Closing Date:** March 5, 2024 (16:00 Hrs)

### Notice Description

The Standards Council of Canada (SCC) invites Bidders to submit a Request for Proposal (RFP) to develop a Technical Specification (TS) for the priority area: Development of Technical Guidance to Advance Surface Temperature and Air Temperature Mapping in Canada. This project is led by the SCC and Health Canada (HC) and aims to support the development of technical guidance for UHI mapping in Canada. Key deliverables include:

* Compiling best practice methodologies and data requirements for developing surface temperature maps
* Compiling best practice methodologies and data requirements for developing air temperature maps

### Requirements and Process

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
* **Proposals Evaluation Criteria:** Highest Combined Rating of Technical Merit and Price
* **Attachment:** Proposal documents and guidelines available at [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28812/scc\_rfp-2023-24-surface-and-air-temperatures-maps-uhi-qanda2_2024-02-05en.pdf) and [Canada Buys website](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/28812/ccn-dp-2023-24-temperature-en-surface-et-de-lair-cartographie-icu\_qetr2_2024-02-05\_fr.pdf)

### Contact Information
For further information regarding the Request for Proposal (RFP), or to obtain clarification regarding this RFP, please contact the SCC procurement representative, Lianne Bernard at contracts@scc.ca or (613) 238-3222. 

Please note that all RFP documentation as well as clarification questions should be sent via email to contracts@scc.ca by the closing date. We do not accept phone calls or in-person inquiries regarding the RFP.
